title: View: Digital payments are transforming India’s economy
description: It is truly remarkable to see the rapid pace of change over the past decade making India the world’s fifth largest economy. India’s concerted push towards a “less-cash” economy is bringing half a billion Indians from underserved communities into the country's economy; a key factor leading the country to becoming one of the world’s fastest growing economies. As Vice Chair of Visa, I strongly believe that advancing financial inclusion is the key to building sustained economic growth and India is creating a model for the future of payments globally.
